name: Bons Empregos plugin
author: Miguel Sousa

sections.description:
PT: O plugin Bons Empregos adiciona um widget ao teu blog que mostra as ultimas ofertas de emprego e pode ser integrado em qualquer sitio do teu blog.

EN: The Bons Empregos Plugin adds a customizable widget which displays the latest job offers from Portugal. It can be integrated anywhere in the blog. This Jobticker shows up the last five or more job offers and is a great solution to help spread job opportunities.
sections.installation:
Could not be simpler
1. Extract bons-empregos-plugin.zip. 2. Upload the bons-empregos-plugin-folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory. 3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress. 4. Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance->Widgets and configure the widget options.

short_description: PT: O plugin Bons Empregos adiciona um widget ao teu blog que mostra as ultimas ofertas de [emprego](http://bonsempregos.com "Ofertas de emprego.
